It's under maintenance from the 11th of July until the 21st of July. Whether it's going to come back is an absolutely critical question, and so far the signals are not particularly good.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: The scramble for gas has intensified following Europe's decision to curtail its dependency on Russian energy. Last year Russia provided 155 billion cubic metres of gas to Europe â€“ that's 40% of the European market.

sentences.sentence: In the nearby city of Turetsk, residents told of explosions and a storm of black smoke and red fire as Russia continues its assault in the country.

sentences.sentence: Kyiv has accused Moscow of launching fresh strikes on multiple residential areas in eastern and southern Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19

sentences.sentence: Many of these people have moved on from the immediate border nations further to Western Europe. A misinformation about these refugees has followed them there. Some online users have claimed that in Germany Ukrainian refugees were invited to stay at a temporary hotel at the former Nazi concentration camp at Sachsenhausen near Berlin. Some people shared this image, claiming that Ukrainian flags and the words Welcome Home were placed outside the barracks at the former camp.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: These claims were spread on many pro-Kremlin telegram channels, as well as by some users on Twitter in German, Italian and Polish.

sentences.sentence: The dark red images that you see here indicate where a photo has been digitally altered.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: And as you can see, those photos were altered exactly where the alleged welcome home banners were placed on the barracks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: exactly where the alleged welcome home banners were placed on the barracks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: So that photo has been digitally altered and those barrack signs did not exist.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: What's more, there is no evidence of any such invitation from the Sachsenhausen Memorial inviting Ukrainian refugees. Indeed, the memorial themselves have posted a statement on social media denying these rumors and saying that they will take legal action against the fake news. It's not clear who is behind those digitally altered images and this misinformation, but the Sachsenhausen Memorial has blamed this on Russia's propaganda warfare, and they say they have reported this misinformation to the German police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: As Europe contends with a ferocious heatwave, diplomats from dozens of countries are gathering in Berlin to discuss efforts to tackle climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: The 12th Petersburg Climate Change Conference started on Monday, with Germany's Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock emphasising the need to stay focused on climate issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: ANNALENA BAERBOCK, German Foreign Minister We have eight years left to almost half global emissions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: That's the commitment we made in Glasgow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But we also have to focus much more on the climate impacts that we have failed to avert.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We owe this to the people around the world, in the Pacific Islands, in Sahel and in other regions who are already suffering and who already feel the impacts of the current climate crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: With record temperatures across Europe in recent weeks, experts are warning that this extreme heat could become the new normal if global warming continues.

sentences.sentence: The underlying state of the vegetation or the flammability, if you like, how ready the vegetation is to burn is increased because of these hotter and drier temperatures as a result of climate change so then in summers and periods like we're in now it just takes an ignition to really ignite very extreme wildfires which are then very difficult to manage environmentalists feared that the search for new energy sources as a result of Russia's invasion of Ukraine may undermine progress towards achieving climate targets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18
sentences.sentence: Organisers are hoping that the two-day conference will help countries to devise a more united approach to climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Addressing representatives from some 40 countries today, German Chancellor Olaf Scholz voiced his concerns at what he described as a global renaissance of fossil fuel energy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: No one can be happy with the fact that the share of coal-fired electricity generation is rising, he said, pointing as well to his own government's recent approval to fire up more coal-fuelled electricity plants in light of those supply shortages as well as rising energy prices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Concerns over energy shortages in Europe continue to mount in Monday, however, after Russian gas giant Gazprom declared force majeure on gas supplies to Europe to at least one major customer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The letter, which was seen by Reuters, says that Gazprom could not fulfil its supply obligations due to extraordinary circumstances and therefore aims to effectively shield Gazprom from compensation payments. This reportedly also concerns supplies through the Nord Stream 1 gas pipeline which is a major supply route for gas here to Germany and wider parts of Europe. It's currently closed for repairs until July 21st, but concerns had already been mounting over whether or not the pipeline will indeed be turned back on again.

sentences.sentence: Kate Brady, Euronews, Berlin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The disease is an extremely infectious hemorrhagic fever from the same family as Ebola.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's transmitted amongst humans through direct contact with the bodily fluids of infected people and surfaces.
